qualitynurse.title: Quality Nurse Website
qualitynurse.description: Modern showcase website for Quality Nurse, home nursing service with 25+ years of experience. Complete presentation of 11 medical services, professional team, Brussels coverage area, and 24/7 emergency contact system.
features: 11 detailed medical services (bathing, wound care, perfusions, etc.)
challenges: Complete modernization of legacy visual identity
Clear organization of 11 complex medical services
results: Modern and professional website live on qualitynurse.be
Clear presentation of services and 25+ years expertise
Improved visibility for home care in Brussels
qualitynurse.longDescription: Quality Nurse represents the complete creation of a modern showcase website for a home nursing service established for over 25 years. The project involved developing a professional web presence for Jean-Charles Tonnelle and his team, specialized in palliative care, perfusions, and enteral nutrition. The website clearly presents the 11 medical services (complete bathing, medication administration, wound care, perfusions, etc.), highlights the team's professional expertise, and facilitates 24/7 emergency contact. Deployed on qualitynurse.be, the site effectively serves patients in the municipalities of Uccle, Ixelles, Forest, Watermael-Boitsfort and surroundings.

lasermagique.title: Laser Magique Application
lasermagique.description: Complete digital transformation of entertainment center operations from paper-based to mobile-first management. Comprehensive booking system, inventory tracking, real-time statistics, and payment history for laser tag and entertainment services.
lasermagique.longDescription: Laser Magique represents a complete digital revolution for entertainment center operations. This comprehensive Flutter application transforms traditional paper-based management into a streamlined, mobile-first solution. The system handles everything from complex booking algorithms to real-time inventory management, payment history, and customer statistics. Currently in active development, this project showcases the power of modern mobile technology in revolutionizing traditional business operations.
nextSteps: Create detailed interface for client profile cards
Complete testing and deploy to production

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: Modern and responsive personal portfolio built with React, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. Showcases my projects, skills and development experiences with elegant design and smooth animations.
portfolio.longDescription: This personal portfolio represents a comprehensive showcase of my modern frontend development skills. Built with React and TypeScript, it uses Tailwind CSS for modern and responsive design. The site offers a smooth user experience with Framer Motion animations, complete multi-language support, and a functional contact form. Optimized for performance and SEO, it demonstrates my mastery of modern web technologies.

circle.title: Circle - Project Management
circle.description: Linear-inspired project management interface built with Next.js and TypeScript. Modern web application for tracking issues, projects and teams with elegant and responsive user interface.
circle.longDescription: Circle is a Linear-inspired web project management application developed with Next.js and TypeScript. This project demonstrates my ability to create modern and complex user interfaces using the latest frontend technologies. The application offers a smooth user experience for managing projects, issues and teams, with elegant and responsive design built with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui.
